name: never-melt-ice
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Ice moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Ice-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.black-white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a piece of ice that repels heat and boosts Ice-type moves.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a piece of ice that repels heat and boosts Ice-type moves.
